page.title: 01 The Area
page.content: This area is mainly grassland and farmland . It has a village which has developed along the main road in the valley.The oldest building in the village is the church which is a part of the Diocese of Salisbury . The school is a voluntary aided church school.In recent years there has been two areas of housing development basically because of commuters to near by town . The main road is a holiday route to the west country. In hard winters the village is often cut off in each directoin because of the high exposed land.
